Medium: Black chalk and moistened black chalk, gray wash (mainly in the clouds, water and sails), greenish yellow and grayish green wash (in the trees and under the houses at the left), and touches of brown chalk (in and under the houses at the left and on the large sailboat).
Provenance: Alexander sale, Sotheby's, London, 21 October 1963, lot 57, ill. (to P. and D. Colnaghi, London, for Robert Lehman).
